item.title: ChanoMa
item.description: Overview Chubu Electric Power(C-EP) supplies electricity to 10 million households in Japan. The goal of this project was to make C-EPâ€™s brand an essential part of family life with a user-centered product and improve its retention rate. ChanoMa (means “Living Room”) is a service for a dual-income households with a small children to tighten family bonds. We decided a dual-income working mother as a primary user because 49% of households are dual-income families in urban area in Japan.
